channel.title: HELP! source error shophandler! *FIXED*
channel.description:
when i added a shop (on matrix source) and compile, i won't get an error. but when i load the source ill get this error:
ERROR! THREAD NAME: main java.lang.RuntimeException: Invalid list for shop line: 10 20139 10 at com.rs.utils.ShopsHandler.loadUnpackedShops(ShopsHandler.java:48) at com.rs.utils.ShopsHandler.init(ShopsHandler.java:30) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:79)
someone know what to do?? thx, Monkey-G
